Headline: UPDATE: Trains bypassing Washington/Wabash and Adams/Wabash Stations
ShortDescription: UPDATE: Pink Line trains are running, but not stopping at Washington/Wabash and Adams/Wabash Stations due to police activity.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
UPDATE: Pink Line trains are running, but not stopping at Washington/Wabash and Adams/Wabash Stations due to police activity.

We apologize for this inconvenience and appreciate your understanding.

Headline: Trains bypassing Washington/Wabash and Adams/Wabash Stations
ShortDescription: Brown Line trains are running, but not stopping at Washington/Wabash and Adams/Wabash Stations due to police activity. Service is resuming, allow extra time

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Brown Line trains are running, but not stopping at Washington/Wabash and Adams/Wabash Stations due to police activity. Service is resuming, allow extra time

Headline: Trains bypassing Washinton/Wabash and Adams/Wabash Stations
ShortDescription: Green Line trains are running, but not stopping at Washington/Wabash and Adams/Wabash Stations due to police activity. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Green Line trains are running, but not stopping at Washington/Wabash and Adams/Wabash Stations due to police activity. Service is resuming, allow extra time

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
